Description.Text: The GEM Hotel - Chelsea, a New York City hotel located in the trendy neighborhood of Chelsea. This trendy Manhattan neighborhood is filled with chic art galleries, night club hotspots, world-famous restaurants, shopping and more. Guests are within walking distance to Penn Station and world-famous Midtown Manhattan attractions such as Madison Square Garden, Times Square, Macy's/Herald Square, the campus of New York University (NYU) and the Empire State Building.The hotel is one block from New York City's subway system. Surrounding neighborhoods include Greenwich Village, the Flatiron District, Union Square, Midtown and the Meat Packing District.

• Fashion Institute of Technology - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • Rubin Museum of Himalayan Art - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi • Chelsea Art Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Madison Square Garden - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Macy's - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi • Empire State Building - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi • Times Square - 1.7 km / 1 mi • Broadway - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 2 km / 1.2 mi • Chrysler Building - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi • Central Park - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi • Ellis Island - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi • Statue of Liberty - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi

Hotel's standard Chelsea rooms offer a full size bed in a chic and intimate smoke-free setting. All the rooms are in a version of affordability which includes down pillows, wide-screened flat-panel LCD televisions, free high-speed wireless internet, cordless phones, coffee makers, turn-down service, SEI premium bottled water, high-end Gilchrist & Soames bath amenities and monogrammed bath robes and many more.

With concierge services, tour assistance, and a multilingual staff, GEM Hotel – Chelsea, an Ascend Collection hotel is equipped to help guests explore Chelsea, and all of New York City. On site, this 6-story modern, boutique hotel features an exercise room with cardiovascular equipment and flat-panel televisions. A business center is available for guest use, and wireless Internet access is complimentary throughout the property. A sun deck provides a quiet area for relaxation.

From West Or Nj Lincoln Tunnel Go South On 12th Ave/West Side highway, Turn Left On West 24th St, Turn Right On 11th Ave.,Turn Left On West 23rd St., Turn Right On 9th Ave., Turn Lefton West 22nd Street.
Great value and world-class quality reside here at the Gem Hotel - Chelsea ; which will exceed all your expectations Close to major attractions and city excitement; we invite you to be our guest
